title: Freddy Merckxury Is the Cycling AI You Didn’t Know You Needed
content:
The chatbot was created by the Belgian Waffle Ride's founder Michael Marckx in an effort to engage with the community in a less serious and more BWR-ish way.

Read the full article at Freddy Merckxury Is the Cycling AI You Didn’t Know You Needed on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
